traditional: 光緒
Guāngxù reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)
guāngxù Guangxu

traditional: 光緒帝
Guāngxùdì Guangxu Emperor

traditional: 就緒
jiùxù ready; in order

traditional: 心緒
xīnxù state of mind; mood

traditional: 思緒
sīxù train of thought; emotional state; mood; feeling

traditional: 情緒
qíngxù feeling; sentiment

traditional: 緒言
xùyán preface

traditional: 緒論
xùlún exordium

traditional: 頭緒
tóuxù outline; main threads

traditional: 打掃
dǎsǎo to clean; to sweep

traditional: 掃射
sǎoshè to strafe

traditional: 掃描
sǎomiáo scan; raster

traditional: 掃興
sǎoxìng to have one's spirits dampened; to feel disappointed

traditional: 掃除
sǎochú to sweep; to clean with a brush; to sweep away (often fig.)

traditional: 掃雷
sǎoléi minesweeper (computer game)

traditional: 橫掃
héngsǎo to sweep away

traditional: 清掃
qīngsǎo to tidy up; to mop up; a sweep (against crime)
réncí benevolent; charitable; kind; kindly; kindness; merciful
císhàn benevolent; charitable
cíbēi mercy

traditional: 慈愛
cíài (adj) love; tenderness, particularily affection shown by elders to children

traditional: 專欄
zhuānlán special column

traditional: 品嘗
pǐncháng to taste a small amount; to sample

traditional: 嘗試
chángshì to try; to attempt

traditional: 未嘗
wèicháng not yet

traditional: 勸告
quàngào advice; urge; exhort; (n) exhortation; (v) advise

traditional: 勸導
quàndǎo try to convince; to advise (sb to do sth)

traditional: 勸說
quànshuō persuade; persuasion; advise

traditional: 勸阻
quànzǔ to advise against; to dissuade

traditional: 奮不顧身
fènbùgùshēn to dash ahead regardless of the danger

traditional: 奮力
fènlì to do everything one can; to spare no effort; one's best

traditional: 奮勇
fènyǒng dauntless; to summon up courage and determination; using extreme force of will

traditional: 奮戰
fènzhàn to fight bravely

traditional: 奮發
fènfā to rouse to vigorous action; energetic mood

traditional: 奮發圖強
fènfātúqiáng to work energetically for prosperity (of the country)

traditional: 奮起
fènqǐ to rise vigorously; a spirited start

traditional: 奮鬥
fèndòu strive; struggle

traditional: 振奮
zhènfèn to stir oneself up; to raise one's spirits; to inspire

traditional: 自告奮勇
zìgàofènyǒng volunteer for; offer to undertake

traditional: 興奮
xīngfèn excited; excitement

traditional: 天賜
tiāncì god-send

traditional: 恩賜
ēncì favor

traditional: 賜予
cíyǔ to grant; to bestow

traditional: 賞賜
shǎngcì to bestow; to confer (a reward for service); a reward

traditional: 菩薩
púsà Bodhisattva (Buddh.)
jiàohǎn exclamation; outcry; shout; yell
hūhǎn to shout (slogans etc)
hǎnjiào cry out; shout
dàhǎndàjiào to call out loudly; to conduct vigorous propaganda; to rant
